title: Russell Wilson Isn’t Living Up to the Hype
text:
Code
qb1 <- qbs %>% filter( G > 2, `Cmp%` >39)




Code
qb2 <- qb1 %>% top_n(4, TD) 




Code
ggplot() +
geom_point(data=qb1, aes(x=TD, y=`Cmp%`, color="red")) +
geom_point(data=qb1, aes(x=TD, y=`Cmp%`)) +
geom_smooth(data=qb1, aes(x=TD, y=`Cmp%`), method="lm") +
geom_point(data=qb1, aes(x=TD, y=`Cmp%`, color="blue"))+ geom_text_repel(data=qb2, aes(x=TD, y=`Cmp%`, label=Player))+
labs(x = "Touchdowns Thrown", y = "Completion Percentage",
title = "Best NFL Defenses",
subtitle = "The best defenses can consistently limit touchdowns and sack the quarterback",
caption = "Source: Football-Reference.com | By Peter Rice", legend.position = "none") +
theme_minimal() + theme(
plot.title = element_text(size = 16, face = "bold"),
axis.title = element_text(size = 12),
axis.text = element_text(size = 9, color = "black") 
) 


`geom_smooth()` using formula 'y ~ x'







Code
qb3 <- qb1  %>% 
  select(Player, TD, Int, `Cmp%`) %>%
  group_by(Player) %>%
  summarize(
    TD,
    Int,
    `Cmp%`
  ) %>%
  select(Player, 
         TD,
         Int,
         `Cmp%` ) %>%
  arrange(desc(TD))




Code
qb3%>% gt()%>% 
  cols_label(
    Int = "Interceptions",
    TD = "Touchdowns" ,
    `Cmp%` = "Completion %"
  ) %>% tab_style(
    style = cell_text(color = "black", weight = "bold", align = "left"),
    locations = cells_title("title")
  ) %>% tab_style(
    style = cell_text(color = "black", align = "left"),
    locations = cells_title("subtitle")
  ) %>%
  tab_source_note(
    source_note = md("**By:** Matt Waite  |  **Source:** wehoop: The SportsDataverse's R Package for Women's Basketball Data")
  ) %>%
  tab_style(
     locations = cells_column_labels(columns = everything()),
     style = list(
       cell_borders(sides = "bottom", weight = px(3)),
       cell_text(weight = "bold", size=12)
     )
   ) %>%
  opt_row_striping() %>% 
  opt_table_lines("none")
